Direct Communication Tool:
A tool that enables direct communication with your clients or contacts to promote your products or services, providing greater reach and effectiveness to your marketing campaigns.

Main Plugin Features:
- Send simple messages.
- Send personalized messages, including attachments.
- Filter databases to validate which of your contacts have or do not have WhatsApp.
- Preview personalized messages before sending.
- Set a time range in seconds for marketing campaign delivery, randomly scheduled to avoid spam.

One-Click Downloads:
- Download with a single clickAll your contacts.
- Contacts from your current chats.
- Contacts from one or multiple groups simultaneously.
- Contacts with a specific label.
- Contacts from a broadcast list.

Effortless Message Sending:
- Select checkboxes and send messages with a single click, just needing to add the message and attachment.

Privacy:
With a single click, access the configuration icon and the ability to prioritize unanswered chats by placing them at the top.

Chatbot:
- Enables automatic responses based on user-defined parameters, including exact words or content within a phrase or message.
- You can generate default messages for all users contacting you or create a fully customized table or content loaded and unloaded from an Excel file.

Forget about monthly payments. With Plugin Sender you only make a single payment for life.
